task.summary: First Commit. Implemented Features: Getting devices from server. Setting frequency control of Radio. Next sprint: - SQLite in-app database to save config file
First Commit. Implemented Features: App preferences. Next sprint: - Fully implement radio and television.

Implemented Power and Volume controls, and improved error handling for preferences and network communication. Added Device Refresh feature. Next sprint: Implement channel controls. Auto refresh when device is opened.
Implemented channel controls and auto-refresh when device is opened. Implemented a workaround for a bug where IntegHome.setup() is called many times. #EndOf10July

MESSAGE.value: First Commit. Implemented Features: Getting devices from server. Next sprint: - SQLite in-app database to save config file - Implement controller functions: read and write to server.
